raw_body: FERDINANDO – LILANI – Safe in the Arms of Jesus. Dearly beloved wife of Rohan Dilantha,​ mother of Ann Nimesha and Shalindri,​ mother-in-law of Shavindra,​ loving daughter of late Lennie and Agnes,​ sister of Sri Kanthie. Cortege leaves Mahinda Jayakody Parlour,​ Walana on Tuesday,​ 30th January 2024 at 3.30 p.m. for Burial at St. Michael’s Church,​ Koralawella Cemetery.         006650
